oai_dc:dc.dc:descriptions: The Wild Cat believed to possess the power of turning itself into a lion. By /han kass o (L VIII.
8083, and 27. 8399 rev., note). |han kass'o's grandfather (Tsatsi) told him that a wild cat turns itself into a lion when many of its kind have been killed by hunters.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A wild cat, when many have been killed by a person changes itself into a lion and kills the slayer
